com.bilal.androidthingscameralib

Class InitializeCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bilal.androidthingscameralib.InitializeCamera

  • public class InitializeCamera
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to deal with methods to deal with images from the camera.

    • Method Summary

      • dumpFormatInfo

        public static void dumpFormatInfo(android.content.Context context)
        Helpful debugging method: Dump all supported camera formats to log. You don't need to run this for normal operation, but it's very helpful when porting this code to different hardware.
